name: Spellcaster (Mage)
languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Potent Cantrip
text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
text: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, shield, sleep

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, burning hands, shield, sleep, flaming sphere, invisibility, fireball, fly, wall of fire
description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
